Title: Designates the Honor and Remember Flag as the official state flag for recognizing armed services members
Summary: Designates the "Honor and Remember Flag" as the official state flag for recognizing armed service members who have died as a result of serving the United States in any war or conflict the nation have been involved in since its inception.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state law, in relation to designating the "Honor and Remember Flag" as the official state flag for recognizing armed services members
